Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this Vivitar Smart Lights and Outlets skill you can easily control your Vivitar Smart Home devices by commanding Alexa using your voice. This will greatly enhance your Smart Home experience and make your life easier and more fun!
 
Here’s a step by step guide for setting up this Skill:
1. Download our Vivitar Smart Home Security app from the iOS App Store or from the Google Play Store
2. Launch the app and create a new account by tapping on Lights/Outlets/Power Strips
3. Power on your Vivitar Smart Home devices and set them up via the Vivitar Smart Home Security app
4. Download and install the Amazon Alexa app from the App Stores and connect it to your Echo device
5. Search for the ”Vivitar Smart Lights and Outlets” skill in the Alexa Skills directory
6. Tap “Enable Skill” on the ”Vivitar Smart Lights and Outlets” skill, then enter your Lights/Outlets/Power Strips account credentials from the Vivitar Smart Home Security app, including your region, username and password and then link your account with Alexa
7. Ask Alexa to discover your devices: “Alexa, discover my devices”. Wait till Alexa replies “Discovery is complete”.
8. You will now see your Vivitar Smart Home devices listed under the Smart Home tab of the Alexa app and will be able to control them via Alexa’s voice commands
 
Supported voice commands:
 “Alexa, discover devices”
 “Alexa, turn on living room light”
 “Alexa, turn off living room light”
 “Alexa, turn on bedroom power strip”
 “Alexa, turn off bedroom power strip”
 “Alexa, turn on office Workplace”
 “Alexa, turn off office Workplace”
 “Alexa, set living room light to red”
 “Alexa, set living room light to blue”
 “Alexa, set living room light to green”
 “Alexa, set living room light to white”
 “Alexa, set living room light to yellow”
 “Alexa, set living room light to orange”
 “Alexa, set living room light to purple”
 “Alexa, set living room light to gold”
 “Alexa, set living room light to 10%”
 “Alexa, set living room light to 50%”
